snippet.title: Co-op Trailer - Hostile Lands - Pixel Art Roguelite Top-Down Shooter - Indie Game
snippet.description:
Hostile Lands is a 2D top-down, Roguelike shooter with 4 Player Couch CO-OP.  Also supports Steam Remote Play Together.  300+ unique weapons, 30 playable character, 11 environments...

Try the FREE Demo on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3075890/Hostile_Lands/

Made with GameMaker

#indiegame #coopgaming #steamgame
